The reduced-order modelling code used to create surrogate models based on an hybridisation of standard reduced-order modelling methods such as the PGD and Deep learning methods is [public](https://github.com/AlexandreDabySeesaram/NeuROM) and [notebooks with tutorials are also available](https://fenni-pgd-aldabyse-d62c0089e00d70057d8fae6bbaedf6cf1d181c44edf5.gitlabpages.inria.fr/).
